** Writing data to a file **

+ write data from R to a txt file: write.table( )
+ write data from R to a csv file: write.csv( )
```{r}
#Load mtcars data
data(mtcars)
#Export mtcars data to text file
write.table(mtcars, file = "./data/mtcars.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = TRUE, col.names = NA)
list.files("./data")  #show a list of files in data foler within the working directory
```

```{r}
write.csv(mtcars, file = "./data/mtcars.csv")
list.files("./data")  #show a list of files in data foler within the working directory
```

** Saving Plots in R **
```{r}
x <- 1:10
y <- 2*x + 5

jpeg("./data/rplot.jpg")

dev.off()
list.files("./data")
```
